transArray.content: The staff service is great. They will take the initiative to send luggage to the room. There is also a separate laundry room. The washing machine and dryer are separated, which is very convenient. The washing machine looks new and clean. Laundry liquid, fabric softener, and disinfectant are also provided for free. The bed in the guest room is very comfortable, the room is spacious, the floor is also very clean, the bedding is very tidy, the sofa is also very clean, the hygiene details are very good, very comfortable, the overall sanitation of the hotel is very good, the room attendant cleans up They will greet each other, and the service attitude is very friendly. The lady at the front desk will also take the initiative to provide disposable toiletries and introduce the layout of the room. The cleaning is also very clean. I am very satisfied with the stay
